31.1.hd_quote: Influence cannot exist in a vacuum.
31.1.behavioral_axis: Knows leadership only functions when there are willing followers to receive the pattern.
31.1.shadow_axis: Trying to lead without a base; isolated proclamations.

31.2.behavioral_axis: Projects leadership before it is recognized; wants to lead now.
31.2.shadow_axis: Premature action that misfires and erodes credibility.

31.3.hd_quote: The ability to carefully assess and choose the proper influence.
31.3.behavioral_axis: Targets influence to people who can actually implement the pattern.
31.3.shadow_axis: Backs the wrong allies; diluted influence.

31.4.hd_quote: The success of influence based on how it is perceived.
31.4.behavioral_axis: Understands leadership is judged by public perception, not just content.

31.5.hd_quote: Lack of external influence guaranteed by attitude.
31.5.behavioral_axis: Holds a strong vision but attitude prevents broad acceptance.
31.5.shadow_axis: Becomes the ‘out of touch’ leader; universalizes personal stance.

31.6.hd_quote: Actions which match the words and thus guarantee success.
31.6.behavioral_axis: Knows leadership only lands when words and actions align at the right time.
31.6.shadow_axis: Sounding like a leader but unable to manifest; perceived hypocrisy.
